Top ten markets versus main last departure airports and 
main airlines to Sri Lanka  
September 2022 
The below tables depict the main last departure airports and airlines analyzed by top markets 
to  Sri  Lanka.  Sri  Lankan  Airlines  and  IndiGo  are  the  most  popular  airlines  for  Indians.  For 
majority  of  travellers 
from  France,Spain  and  United  States,  Qatar  Airways 
is 
the  most 
preferable airline and Doha is the main last departure airport. The figures further indicates that 
for tourists from the  United  Kingdom,Australia,  Germany,  Russian  Federation,  Canada  and 
Maldives  Sri  Lankan  Airlines  is  the  most  preferable  Airline  indicating  the  importance  of 
destination aceessibility in driving visitation.
